Importing the pols-month csv file

```{r}
pols_month_df = 
  read_csv(file = "./data/fivethirtyeight_datasets/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day")) |>
  mutate(
    month = month.abb[as.numeric(month)]
    )
  
```
